title: How to download the replays into the computer?
body:
Can someone teach me how to download the replays into the mac book? I only know I can watch the replays in the client, but I want to save good replays in my mac book.

Thanks.{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
A replay file is downloaded to your computer before you can watch it. Example:

> Documents/League of Legends/Replays/NA1-2377127277.rofl

You can use that file to watch the replay as many times as you want. With the in game controls you can record clips and save them. Example:

> Documents/League of Legends/Highlights/6-24_NA1-2377127277_01.webm
HOW DO YOU DOWNLOAD A REPLAY?
What this person is asking, is how do you download a replay file that can be view in a media player such as Quicktime, or imported into Premiere and edited?
Bump.  I want the whole replay as a webm without having to watch the whole game with the record button.
convert the file
Yeah I'm having that problem.
Just download them in the match history in the new client.
Say I want to upload my replay to youtube how do I do that with your solution?  Or is your solution not really the solution to this dude's question but rather an ignorant reply?
I really would like to know this as well. Riot?
They're only valid until next update. You can't watch them after client updates.
With VLC I just took the files and converted them to mp4s' using the save and convert option!

I found the replay in the folder however need assistance with viewing the file. It does not open in the client itself and the game is no longer in my match history. is there anything I can do to view this still? perhaps converting the file to a new version?

I can't find that folder. i don't have those folders (replays, highlights) in my laptop 
{{champion:61}}
I can't play it. It says the file has no video
same
Bump
How to download a match played from my account to my phone ?

go to your game reply, there is an arrow crossed down on the right of each game you have played, hold your mouse on it and you'll see it says download, click on it and download your game reply.
pay attention that the game replys will expire after a couple more games!
go to onlinevideoconverter.com/media-converter then put the .webm file and download it
Yasuo montage
i got 3 penta kills in one game and i want to down download the replay  but this happened on 10/9/17. so how do i download it?
{{champion:412}}  main
how can i download my replay on my PC .. ? pls guys help mee !!??...
